entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023
